## n8n@1.0.4 View the [commits](https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n/compare/n8n@1.0.3...n8n@1.0.4) for this version.
**Release date:** 2023-07-19 This is a bug fix release. /// warning | Breaking changes Please note that this version contains breaking changes if upgrading from a `0.x.x` version. For full details, refer to the [n8n v1.0 migration guide](/1-0-migration-checklist.md). /// For full release details, refer to [Releases](https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n/releases) on GitHub.
